mapper.insert: insert into book_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) values(seq_book_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update book_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select bno, rno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from (select /*+INDEX(book_reply idx_book_reply) */ rownum rn, bno, rno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from book_reply where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and rownum <=#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from book_reply where bno = #{bno}
